25-02-06-communication1.title: Automated data clean-up in the Time and Labour module
25-02-06-communication1.what: • Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) will be performing a data clean-up activity...
25-02-06-communication1.action: No action is required as this process is automated.
25-02-06-communication1.notes: Departments will continue to receive the bi-weekly Time and Labour reports...
25-02-06-communication1.resources: The Time and Labour Payable Status describes the process...
25-02-06-communication1.who: Who to contact for pay system support
